title: Bewitching Table
summaries: The Bewitching Table is a furniture item found naturally placed in the Dungeon. In Hardmode, it is also sold by the Witch Doctor for 10 GC if the Wizard is present.

Placing and pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on the Bewitching Table grants the Bewitched buff, which increases the player's minion capacity by 1. This lasts until the player dies or leaves the world, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).

Unlike <linked>equipment buff items</linked>, the Bewitching Table must be placed in order to activate the buff. It can be mined with a <linked>pickaxe</linked> or <linked>drill</linked> and picked up again, even while the buff is active, which will not cancel the buff. Placement is only dependent on an adequate space of 3×3 tiles being available.
